sources.title: The Sour Puss (1940)
sources.description: Porky decides to go fishing the next day and tells his cat. The cat sleeps fitfully. The next day, while they are fishing, the cat gets into a battle with a flying fish who behaves rather like Daffy Duck. This is a Computer Colorized version from 1995.Â Recorded From Tooncast Latin America.

metadata.Plot: Porky decides to go fishing the next day and tells his cat. The cat sleeps fitfully. The next day, while they are fishing, the cat gets into a battle with a flying fish who behaves rather like Daffy Duck.
